title: GM Drives in Political Reverse
sub_head: Mary Barra drops support for a Trump suit against California.
body:
CEOs are offering alms to win favor with their future federal regulators. This week’s aim-to-please prize goes to CEO Mary Barra, who pulled the plug on GM’s support for the Trump Administration in its legal challenge to California’s electric car mandate.
The Trump Environmental Protection Agency last year revoked the Obama Administration’s Clean Air Act waiver that allowed California to set its own auto greenhouse gas emission standards. Car makers complained that California’s electric-vehicle mandate and stringent emissions...
